options.name: Veterinarian
options.description: Gain +1 Animals and you can use your Medic Skills that target Humanoids on Beasts.

options.name: Action : Stabilize
options.description: You quickly apply a Sterile Bandage to a Creature, ending any Bleeding Condition and causing them to not lose Lifeline Points at the end of their turn while in Lifeline unless they take Damage.

options.name: Treat Wounds
options.description: You spend 1 minute treating a Humanoid or Beast, restoring Health equal to a Medicine Check and using a Sterile Bandage. A Creature can only be affected by this ability once per Full Rest.

options.name: Action : Resuscitate
options.description: If a Humanoid has been dead for less than 1 minute and is not missing any vital organs, you can attempt to revive them with a Cumulative Medicine Check of 28 over 3 Checks

options.name: Action : Bloodletting
options.description: Using a blade, you give a Creature the Bleeding Condition by making a small cut. If this is used in a hostile way, make a normal Attack with a Light Piercing or Slashing Weapon and foce the Target to make a Resilience Check against the Physical Damage dealt after Mitigation. If the Creature Bleeds for 4 turns, they are cured of any Disease or Poison affecting them.

options.name: Triage
options.description: You spend 10 Minutes tending to up to 5 allies, restoring Health equal to 1d12 + a Medicine Check by using a number of Sterile Bandages equal to the number of Creatures being treated. A Creature can only be affected by this ability once per day.

options.name: Reaction : Damage Control
options.description: Using your knowledge of Medicine and Anatomy, when you take Physical Damage, you can reduce it by half before applying Mitigations.

options.name: Diagnosis
options.description: When you restore a Creatures Health with Treat Wounds or Triage, you also remove any Blindness, Deafness or Wounded Condition from them.

options.name: Vital Spot
options.description: The True Hit threshold on your Weapon Attacks is increased by 1

options.name: Placebo Effect
options.description: Whenever you restore Health or remove a Condition from a Creature, they receive Temporary Health equal to your Level.

options.name: Master Healer
options.description: The limits on how many times you can treat a Creature with Triage and Treat Wounds are removed
